author: SteveL-MSFT
body:
@PowerShell/powershell-committee discussed #2544 and decided that we should fix all the cmdlets except for the Provider ones as it's a risky breaking change as we can't be certain if $null is a valid value for the path.  

- [x] Get-Credential -UserName
- [x] Get-Event -SourceIdentifier
- [x] Get-EventSubscriber -SourceIdentifier
- [x] Get-Help -Name
- [x] Get-PSBreakpoint -Script
- [x] Get-PSProvider -PSProvider
- [x] Get-PSSessionConfiguration -Name
- [x] Get-PSSnapin -Name
- [x] Get-Runspace -Name
- [x] Get-RunspaceDebug -RunspaceName
- [x] Get-Service -Name
- [x] Get-TraceSource -Name
- [x] Get-Variable -Name
- [x] Get-WmiObject -Class
- [x] Get-WmiObject -Property

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: Can we fix this in one PR or in separate PRs?

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @iSazonov I think a single PR would be fine
